1.0.name: wordpress/cuusoo-project-embed
1.0.description:
A WordPress plugin that allows you to embed information about a LEGO® Cuusoo project in your post and pages. Simply paste the project URL into a post or page and a small picture, follower count and number of views the project has will be displayed along with a link to the full project page. This is an example project URL: http://lego.cuusoo.com/ideas/view/8889

LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this plugin.

The main development of the plugin all happens on GitHub.
